dmca.title: [EV1-C957166B] Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref: 2.2.115
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, September 16, 2006 9:25 AM To: Andrea Almeida Subject: [EV1-C957166B] Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref: 2.2.115 Dallas ==== Original Message ==== 1. Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref: 2.2.115 Added by system at Thursday, Sep 14 2006 10:17 am X-MailFrom: BrandProtection@aflac.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Sep 14 10:17:46 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 14 Sep 2006 10:17:00 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 14 Sep 2006 10:17:00 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from BrandProtection@aflac.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GNsxY-0001dG-3B; Thu, 14 Sep 2006 10:17:00 -0500 Received: from mail45.messagelabs.com ([216.82.249.195]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from BrandProtection@aflac.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1GNsxW-0003zD-Qf; Thu, 14 Sep 2006 10:16:58 -0500 X-VirusChecked: Checked X-Env-Sender: BrandProtection@aflac.com X-Msg-Ref: server-4.tower-45.messagelabs.com!1158247012!6758694!7 X-StarScan-Version: 5.5.10.7; banners=-,-,- X-Originating-IP: [209.37.4.67] Received: (qmail 11216 invoked from network); 14 Sep 2006 15:16:55 -0000 Received: from mail.aflac.com (HELO PCMEX03A.hq.aflac.com) (209.37.4.67) by server-4.tower-45.messagelabs.com with SMTP; 14 Sep 2006 15:16:55 -0000 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Received: from PCMEX04.hq.aflac.com ([10.175.7.42]) by PCMEX03A.hq.aflac.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.211); Thu, 14 Sep 2006 11:16:29 -0400 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.3790.181 Content-Class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6D810.C0ADF6B0" Subject: Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref: 2.2.115 Date: Thu, 14 Sep 2006 11:16:29 -0400 Message-ID: <1EB64CD50334714A81BBB06FDE4FA26D01E1DA46@PCMEX04.hq.aflac.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Cease and Desist Request - Multi-issues - Aflac-Ref: 2.2.115 thread-index: AcbYEMCi03XCirWaTTypnGD2T2YOPQ== X-Priority: 1 Priority: Urgent Importance: high From: "Brand Protection" To: , , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Sep 2006 15:16:29.0654 (UTC) FILETIME=[C10C8F60:01C6D810] Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 216.82.249.195 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of aflac.com) client-ip=216.82.249.195; envelope-from=BrandProtection@aflac.com; helo=mail45.messagelabs.com; (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Registrant/Owner: American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus (Aflac) is the owner of the Aflac mark. We recently became aware of your use of our trademarked word Aflac in multiple page elements at http://3788.ohdkp.info/ to attract internet traffic to your website. Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an obvious attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the Aflac name. Accordingly, Aflac demands that you immediately cease and desist from any further use of the Aflac mark on your website. Additionally, Aflac must receive a reply to this email within five (5) days from the date of this email as written confirmation that you will make no use of the Aflac mark in the future. We will be monitoring your website and we await your written confirmation via email to brandprotection@aflac.com. Nothing in this email shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies of Aflac, all of which are expressly reserved. Sincerely, Brand Protection Coordinator Ref: 2.2.115 On-Line Brand Protection Coordinator Corporate Communications Aflac Worldwide Headquarters Fax: 706.320.2288 1932 Wynnton Road, Columbus, Georgia 31999 brandprotection@aflac.com | aflac.com Confidentiality Notice: This e-mail and any attachments may contain confidential information intended solely for the use of the addressee. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, any distribution, copying, or use of this e-mail or its attachments is prohibited. If you received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately by e-mail and delete this message and any copies. Thank you. MIME element (text/html) Mailroom template

Dear Registrant/Owner:

 

American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus (Aflac) is the owner of the Aflac mark. We recently became aware of your use of our trademarked word Aflac in multiple page elements at http://3788.ohdkp.info/ to attract internet traffic to your website. Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an obvious attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the Aflac name. 

 

Accordingly, Aflac demands that you immediately cease and desist from any further use of the Aflac mark on your website. Additionally, Aflac must receive a reply to this email within five (5) days from the date of this email as written confirmation that you will make no use of the Aflac mark in the future. We will be monitoring your website and we await your written confirmation via email to brandprotection@aflac.com.

 

Nothing in this email shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies of Aflac, all of which are expressly reserved.

 

 

Sincerely,

Brand Protection Coordinator

 

Ref: 2.2.115

 

 

 

On-Line Brand Protection Coordinator
Corporate Communications
Aflac Worldwide Headquarters

Fax: 706.320.2288
1932 Wynnton Road,
Columbus, Georgia 31999
brandprotection@aflac.com | aflac.com

 

Confidentiality Notice:
This e-mail and any attachments may contain confidential information intended solely for the use of the addressee.  If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, any distribution, copying, or use of this e-mail or its attachments is prohibited.  If you received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately by e-mail and delete this message and any copies. Thank you.
MIME element (text/plain)
